name: Hados
description:
Hados is a game where you need to kill the boss king  to win.

You need to escape evil robots and try to not take much damage to win, if you kill a lot of robots you can win with a 3 stars.

The game is base on his inventory system and a lot of weapons with unique combat mecanics like a hammer who deal a lot of damage but is very slow or a spear with a combo system but doesn't deal a lot of damages.
